scripts.start_redis: docker stop redis-container || true  && docker rm redis-container || true  && docker run -d -p 6379:6379 --name redis-container redis
scripts.start_db: docker stop mysql-container || true  && docker rm mysql-container || true  && docker run --name mysql-container -p 3307:3306 -e MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD=root -e MYSQL_DATABASE=todo_db -d mysql
scripts.dev: yarn start_redis && yarn start_db && nodemon index.js
